title: Practice Challenge
description: Apply what you've learned in this interactive coding challenge.
instructions:
Create your learning roadmap!

Print a personalized plan with:

1. What you've learned (review curriculum)
2. Skills to deepen (pick 3 topics)
3. Projects to build (3 project ideas)
4. Resources to explore:
   - Microsoft Learn paths
   - YouTube channels
   - Books to read
   - Communities to join
5. 30-day action plan
6. 90-day goals
7. 1-year vision

This is YOUR roadmap to mastery!

hints.text: Reflect on journey. Plan next steps. Set goals (30/90/365 days). List resources. Choose projects. Join community. Keep learning!
Tutorial hell: Don't just watch tutorials! BUILD projects. Learning-by-doing is 10x more effective. Stop watching, start coding!
Imposter syndrome: Every developer feels this! Even experts. It's normal. Keep building, you know more than you think!
Analysis paralysis: Don't endlessly research 'best practices'. Start building, refactor later. Progress > Perfection.
Isolated learning: Join communities! Pair programming, code reviews, discussions teach more than solo study. Connect with other developers!

commonMistakes.consequence: Don't just watch tutorials! BUILD projects. Learning-by-doing is 10x more effective. Stop watching, start coding!
commonMistakes.correction: Review the correct syntax and best practices for this concept.
